room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Our gaming group of 9 adults did this as our very first Escape Room. It's quite technical. We found ourselves completely stuck and stumped over and over. Thank goodness the staff gave us clues, or we would have not made any progress at all. I would not recommend this room for children under the age of 12. The clues are simply too advanced for small kids. Great surprise elements. Very well-designed room layout. Wonderful atmospheric effect created with minimalist decor.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Parallax was my second (and my wife's first) escape room. We got hung up once or twice trying to recognize patterns, but all in all it was a fun and different style than the fantasy ruin type I did before. The lights and music really added to the experience. We escaped with 10 minutes remaining!

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Parallax was a great room because it had so many thrilling and surprising puzzles.  I have escaped from 22 of 25 rooms across the nation, but this will remain in the top 5 because of its uniqueness.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Parallax was great we managed to escape with 5 minutes left! It definitely was detailed and clearly was worked hard on. We had a blast as we completed our third room! 10 out of 10 you got to visit ;)

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Booked for a friends birthday , it was awesome better than I expected . Clues are everywhere and it's a definite challenge. Thanks for a great time !!

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: We were seconds too slow in escaping, but that doesn't mean we didn't feel accomplished. Puzzles are hard, and so fun to work together to try and solve. We did Parallax. Highly recommend this for families, groups of friends, or co- workers. Proud of Memphis, and it's newest attraction.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: I booked the Parallax room for our group to try to escape from for part of my brother's bachelor party. We had a blast and succeeded in defeating the room with 1:19 left on the clock! Would definitely recommend Memphis Escape Rooms as a great way to spend time with friends.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Had a blast! I called last minute to book a time for me and my coworkers, and keith said he'd call me back if they got one... 5 minutes later he called and said the other people r/s'd their time so we got the time we wanted! It worked out perfect, Thank you so much Keith!!!

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Our whole experience with Memphis Escape Rooms was awesome. The rooms were challenging and fun, and the staff was amazing! We had car trouble and they worked with us to accommodate our time delay. They cheered us on when we won (escaped), and were all-around friendly and helpful! We conquered The Carnival and Parallax, and will definitely be back to escape the other two rooms! Thanks to Keith and the rest of the team. We had a great time for my husband's 30th birthday.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: My family, friends, and I just did the Mayflower room and had an absolute blast! We barely managed to escape in time. The staff was super friendly and even took a bunch of pics for us to celebrate! Can't wait to go back and try the other room.

room_title: Escape room "Parallax" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: This was so much fun! The staff is great, the room and clues were incredible, and I can't wait to go back and try another room! I highly recommend giving it a try!
